content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is in the city center, and it's newly built, so I understand that the rent might be a bit higher. However, I am a student, so I'm hoping for a lower price. How about 500 euros?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 500 euros is a very low offer considering the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. The apartment is indeed of high quality, and its location is very convenient. How about 600 euros? It's a reasonable offer, and as a student, I can afford it, but I still appreciate the quality of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 600 euros is more in line with what I was expecting. However, I'm willing to make a deal with you today if you can come up with 650 euros. This would be a fair price for both parties, considering the market value and the amenities provided. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate the quality of the apartment and its location. How about 625 euros as a compromise? It's a fair price for me as a student, and it's also a fair price for you considering the apartment's quality.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 625 euros. The apartment is worth more than that. If you can't afford 650 euros, I understand, but I cannot go lower. It's a great deal for a student to live in such a prime location with a brand-new apartment. I'm willing to wait for someone who values the apartment at its true worth.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, Herr Schmidt. I understand that 650 euros is a fair price for the apartment. Therefore, I agree to the price of 650 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 650 euros! Let's sign the lease and make this arrangement official. Congratulations on your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I'm looking forward to living in the new apartment. Let's sign the lease!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Perfect! I'll have the lease ready for you to sign. Please take a moment to review the terms and conditions before you sign. Once you're ready, we'll make this official. Thank you for choosing my apartment!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I've reviewed the lease, and everything seems to be in order. I agree to the terms and conditions, and I'm ready to sign the lease.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Wonderful! Once you've signed the lease, we'll shake on it, and the apartment will be yours. Thank you again for your business. I'm sure you'll be very happy in your new home. Congratulations!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Max! If you have any questions or need assistance with anything regarding the move, please let me know. I'm here to help. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your help and hospitality.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome! I'm glad to have you as a tenant. If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new apartment! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
